recipes.name: Old Fashioned
recipes.instructions: Place sugar and bitters in glass. Add a splash of water/soda. Add whiskey and ice. Stir for 20-30 seconds until diluted and chilled. Garnish with orange zest.

recipes.name: Cuba Libre
recipes.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Squeeze in fresh lime juice and drop the wedge in. Pour in the rum. Top with Cola and stir gently to combine.

recipes.name: Tequila Sunrise
recipes.instructions: Pour Tequila and Orange Juice into a glass filled with ice. Stir. Slowly pour Grenadine down the inside edge of the glass so it sinks to the bottom, creating the sunrise effect. Do not stir again.

recipes.name: Caipirinha
recipes.instructions: Place lime wedges and sugar in the glass. Muddle firmly to release juice and oils. Fill glass with crushed ice. Pour Cachaça over the ice and stir well to dissolve sugar.

recipes.name: Moscow Mule
recipes.instructions: Fill copper mug with ice. Add vodka and lime juice. Top with spicy Ginger Beer. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime wheel and mint sprig.

recipes.name: Dry Martini
recipes.instructions: Stir ingredients with plenty of ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or olive.

recipes.name: Margarita
recipes.instructions: Rub rim of glass with lime and dip in salt. Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into the prepared glass.

recipes.name: Mai Tai
recipes.instructions: Shake all ingredients vigorously with crushed ice. Pour everything (unstrained) into a double old-fashioned glass. Garnish with mint sprig and lime shell.
